sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useTranslation } from "react-i18next"; import { Button, Card, Col, Form, FormControl, FormGroup, Row, Container } from 'react-bootstrap' import Select from "react-select"; const FormQuoterTypeNatural = () => { const { t, i18n } = useTranslation(); const optionsConfirmation = [ { value: '1', label: 'Sí' }, { value: '2', label: 'No' } ] const optionsNationality = [ { value: '1', label: 'Cuba' }, { value: '2', label: 'Panamá' }, { value: '3', label: 'Venezuela' } ] const optionsPayments = [ { value: '1', label: 'Mensual' }, { value: '2', label: 'Trimestral' }, { value: '3', label: 'Semestral' }, { value: '4', label: 'Anual' }, ] const optionsBanking = [ { value: '1', label: 'International Banking' }, { value: '2', label: 'Fuerza en venta' }, ] return (
{t("FirstName")}
{t("SecondName")}
{t("FirstLastName")}
{t("SecondLastName")}
{t("Date Of Birth")}
{t("Nationality")}
{t("Amount Feci")}
{t("Term (months)")}
{t("Payments")}
{t("Ballom Fee")}
{t("Legal Expenses")}
{t("Financial Trust")}
) } export default FormQuoterTypeNatural
